segments.text: Would you like to have a piece of cake ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you . I'm on a diet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm considering entering for the beauty contest this summer , so I must have a slender figure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Women of all shapes would be beautiful if they are self-confident .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid the judges do not think so . All the beauty contests are for slim girls only .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . There's a beauty contest in Thailand just for fat beauties .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All the beauties who entered the contest were over 80kg .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I'm not fat enough to enter that contest .
segments.speaker: S2
